authorCommits.message:
enhancement: remove requirement for `attachment_key` on trix fields when field is `ActionText` (#3567)

* make uploads work also with trix editor if the field is action text

* remove requirement of attachment_key from action text

* rm attr_reader :attachments_disabled

* Merge branch 'main' into actiontext

# Conflicts:
#	app/components/avo/fields/trix_field/edit_component.rb
#	lib/avo/fields/trix_field.rb

* revert build_attachment_path

* fix attachments_disabled

---------

Co-authored-by: Olli <olli17@gmx.net>
Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <paul.ionut.bob@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>
